Community-Development-Block-Grant

Source: ../HUDR/vignettes/Community-Development-Block-Grant.Rmd
Community-Development-Block-Grant.Rmd

About

“The Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) Program has Disaster Recovery grants to rebuild the affected areas and provide crucial seed money to start the recovery process. These flexible grants help cities, counties, and States recover from Presidentially declared disasters, especially in low-income areas, subject to availability of supplemental appropriations. Since CDBG Disaster Recovery (CDBG-DR) assistance may fund a broad range of recovery activities, HUD can help communities and neighborhoods that otherwise might not recover due to limited resources (https://www.hud.gov/program_offices/comm_planning/cdbg-dr).”

The datasets which this function deals with are located at https://drgr.hud.gov/public/data_downloads.html?programName=DR%20CDBG. The first two datasets are the same, but are organized in a different manner.

Querying the HUD Exchange website for data is a bit different than HUD User. These datasets do not need a key.

FILE 1) DR CDBG CDBG-DR Financial Report by Appropriation 2) DR CDBG CDBG-DR Financial Report by Grantee 3) DR CDBG CDBG-DR Financial Report Monthly Summary 4) DR CDBG CDBG-DR Performance by Activity

Example

CDBG-DR Financial Report by Appropriation

This is an example grabbing the first file, DR CDBG CDBG-DR Financial Report by Appropriation, and displaying the first 6 rows.

library(hudr)
head(hud_cdbg(file = 1))

Output Data

Appropriation Abbreviation

Appropriation

Grantee

Grant

Grant Status

Grant $ (Grant Level)

Grant Obligated $

Obligated %

Grant Disbursed $

Disbursed %

Remaining Balance

CDBG CDBG-DR Financial Report by Grantee

This is an example grabbing the second file, DR CDBG CDBG-DR Financial Report by Grantee, and displaying the first 6 rows.

head(hud_cdbg(file = 2))

Output Data

Grantee State

Appropriation

Grantee Grant

Grant Status

Grant $ (Grant Level)

Grant Obligated $

Obligated %

Grant Disbursed $

Disbursed %

Remaining Balance

CDBG-DR Financial Report Monthly Summary

This is an example grabbing the third file, DR CDBG CDBG-DR Financial Report Monthly Summary, and displaying the first 6 rows. The data provides grants that were given in the last month.

head(hud_cdbg(file = 3))

Output Data

Grantee State

Grantee

Grant

Grant $ (deprecated)

Activity Budget $

% Budget

Activity Obligation $

% Obligated

Activity Drawn $

Activity Budget Disbursed %

Remaining Balance

DR CDBG CDBG-DR Performance by Activity

This is an example grabbing the fourth file, DR CDBG CDBG-DR Performance by Activity, and displaying the first 6 rows.

head(hud_cdbg(file = 4))

Output Data

Appropriation

Grantee

Grant

Activity Responsible Org

Activity Type

Activity Number

Activity Title

Activity Status

Activity Measure Category

Low Projected

Low Actual

Low Actual to Projected %

Mod Projected

Mod Actual

Mod Actual to Projected %

Total Projected

Total Actual
